vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
δευτερ-αῖος, α, ον,
on the second day, usually agreeing with the subject of the Verb, δ. ἐκ τοῦ Ἀθηναίων ἄστεος ἦν ἐν Σπάρτῃ [Refs 5th c.BC+]; also τῇ δ. (i.e. ἡμέρᾳ) [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: on the followingnext day, on the second day
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
on the followingnext day, on the second day
on the second day, of a certain state or process, and used as an epithet of the subject or agent, Acts 28:13*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: dentro de dos días o al segundo día
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: ngày thứ nhì; trong hai ngày; ngày hôm sau.
